page.title: 17AMY'S FAMILY WEEKEND-SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday I woke up at 10.00am,had breakfast and got ready for church. I sing in choir with my mum and dad. The service begins at 11.00am and was communion and I put the candles out after it. At 12.00 we went home in the rain and while mum and dad read I played with my doll's house. At 2.00pm we had our Sunday lunch. After that we all played monopoly until tea time and dad won. At 4.30pm we had baked beans on toast for tea I washed up and John dried. Then we rode on our bikes until it was time for bed. When we were ready dad read us a story and we went to sleep about 9.00pm.
